DOC.brief_summary: The purpose PET study verify bind Lu AF35700 multiple oral dose dopamine serotonin receptor male patient schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) Study Investigating Dopamine Serotonin Receptor Occupancy After Multiple Oral Dosing Lu AF35700

The patient Clinical Global Impression Severity Illness ( CGIS ) score ≤ 4 ( moderately ill ) screen safety baseline 5 . The patient currently oral therapy one antipsychotic medication list Appendix II . 6 . The patient Positive Negative Syndrome Scale ( PANSS ) total score ≤ 80 7 . The patient score ≤ 4 ( moderate ) follow PANSS item screen safety baseline : P7 ( hostility ) , G8 ( uncooperativeness ) 1 . The patient experience acute exacerbation require hospitalization within last 3 month . 2 . The patient experience acute exacerbation require change antipsychotic medication ( reference drug dose ) within last 4 week . 3 .
